Paragraph.Text: The Coiler is a regular Conveyor fitted with a machine for winding extruded wires into coils, and behaves like a Conveyor in all circumstances.
Feed metal wires into the Coiler plant, ideally directly from an Extrusion Plant. The Coiler will convert the wires into Coils which can be used in additional recipes.
The Coiler Plant is essential for the automation of Laboratory Research.
